alert.note: Alert for New Castle (Delaware) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued September 25 at 3:30PM EDT until September 27 at 12:00AM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM TUESDAY TO MIDNIGHT EDT TUESDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Up to one foot of inundation above ground level is expected in low-lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways. * WHERE...Tidal areas in New Castle County, Delaware and in Salem County, New Jersey. * WHEN...From 7:00 PM Tuesday until midnight on Tuesday night. * IMPACTS...At this level, flooding begins on the most vulnerable roads in coastal and bayside communities, and along inland tidal waterways. Some partial or full road closures are possible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Additional lingering minor tidal flooding is possible from late Tuesday night into Wednesday. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. Delaware River at Reedy Point MLLW Categories - Minor 7.2 ft, Moderate 8.2 ft, Major 9.2 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 1.4 ft, Moderate 2.4 ft, Major 3.4 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- -------- 25/08 PM 6.6 0.8 0.6 None 26/09 AM 6.5 0.7 1.3 None 26/09 PM 7.9 2.1 1.7 Minor 27/10 AM 6.9 1.1 1.4 None 27/10 PM 7.5 1.7 1.2 Minor 28/11 AM 6.7 0.9 0.9 None &&
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
